summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Brooklyn Avenue, from East 43rd Street to East 45th Street; by widening the existing roadway and paving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 7562 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
